content: Usman R. Alim Usman Raza Alim Ne Ardua Terreant Home Research Teaching Contact Associate Professor Department of Computer Science University of Calgary Co-director Data Science and Analytics PhD, Computing Science, Simon Fraser University MS, Computer Science, RIT BS/BA Physics/Math., University of Rochester Research Interests I am a member of the Graphics Jungle where I head the Visualization and Graphics Group (VISAGG). My interests include: Data Visualization and Computer Graphics Non-Cartesian Computing (non-Cartesian lattices, splines and wavelets, data representation and management) Physically-based Modeling and Rendering Since both Visualization and Graphics are diverse areas, my research is quite multidisciplinary and draws on other scientific avenues such as Scientific Computing, Signal and Image Processing, Computational Fluid Dynamics, Medical Imaging, and Machine Learning.
